directions: Mix zucchini, flour, egg, sugar, and salt in a large bowl until batter is well-combined.
Heat 2 tablespoons butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Drop tablespoonfuls of batter into the skillet and cook until golden brown, about 2 minutes per side. Repeat with remaining batter.
ingredients: 3 tablespoons superfine sugar, or more to taste
title: Kabachkovyye Olad'i Sladkiye (Sweet Zucchini Pancakes)
